I think I've found it, the worst hentai of all time. I'm not even kidding. The wife looks plastic and emotionless, the presentation of the panels is a mess with no pacing, the dialogue is garbage, the amount of (LOL) completely kills my boner, there is no ending or conclusion (the doujin just ends lmao), and the guy keeps asking if he's better than the husband over and over again to the point where it just comes off as insecurity. Not even the art is good. It's just shaded. You can shade anything and it'll look "good." Remove the shading and the art will look exactly like the first 9 pages. The sex scenes are also boring as fuck.

Ask any relationship expert what this means...or any sexual psychologist. Love affects sexual sensitivity...if she's not feeling good from you anymore, then the love isn't there anymore. (she may still care about you...or even be comfortable/content with you...but she's not IN LOVE with you, anymore) Only way you should agree to be in an open relationship is if she gives YOU free reign to fuck whomever you want, too.
